channel.title: Jagex announces new MMOG, Stellar Dawn
channel.description:
UK based developer Jagex has this morning announced their new MMORPG project. Jagex, who are known for their massively popular title Runescape, will be entering the sci-fi MMO arena with the new title Stellar Dawn. The game will be due for release next year and Jagex say that it will feature "science fiction storylines and a variety of gameplay styles" and also "offer players the opportunity to explore vast worlds of futuristic environments and engage with an extensive backstory as they progress through the game". “Stellar Dawn will be Jagex’s biggest release to date and everyone at the studio is absolutely electric with excitement as we enter the final stages of development,” said Mark Gerhard, Jagex CEO. “We are really happy with how well Stellar Dawn has come together. The team has deftly blended art, content and technology to provide the entertaining, long-term game appeal that we have become famous for. As we approach the public launch next year we will be revealing many more details about the game to the community on stellardawn.com.”
[img]http://www.incgamers.com/images/screenshots/19828orig.jpg[/img] [ul][li][url=http://stellardawn.com]http://stellardawn.com[/url][/li] [li]http://www.incgamers.com/News/23974/stellar-dawn-announced[/li][/ul] Discuss.

item.title: Jagex announces new MMOG, Stellar Dawn
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

or maybe they just throw this stuff in to screw with the people looking where they shouldn’t be. For example the Cell phone item data with no models.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex announces new MMOG, Stellar Dawn

item.title: Jagex announces new MMOG, Stellar Dawn
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“c|p, post:41, topic:348972”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=445343.msg3287408#msg3287408 date=1280286994]

I just noticed this about this topic, what’s the difference between an MMOG and an MMORPG? In terms of this game vs runescape I mean.

MMORPG is just a sub-group in the MMOG universe. I think the article used that term because it’s not yet determined (are they’re not yet aware) what type of game it’s going to be.
[/quote]RS = RPG
SD = not declared.

It uses the EXACT SAME client as RS, so it would have to be the same type of game, right?

the references to stellar dawn in the rs client are no doubt fragments of testing or something left about in the engine (probably just for ensuring the engine is able to operate as intended). it’s an almost certain bet to say that they will not be using the same client as runescape. the same engine, however, has been confirmed.[/quote]

The client is basically the engine isn’t it? I’m not saying it will be on the same page with a choice or anything, but I’d bet it will be the same client.jar.

Read full topic
item.source: Jagex announces new MMOG, Stellar Dawn

[/quote]RS = RPG
SD = not declared.

It uses the EXACT SAME client as RS, so it would have to be the same type of game, right?[/quote]

the references to stellar dawn in the rs client are no doubt fragments of testing or something left about in the engine (probably just for ensuring the engine is able to operate as intended). it’s an almost certain bet to say that they will not be using the same client as runescape. the same engine, however, has been confirmed.

item.title: Jagex announces new MMOG, Stellar Dawn
item.dc:creator: @ownagesbot ownagesbot
item.description:
@ownagesbot wrote:

What is Stellar Dawn?

Stellar Dawn is the latest MMO from Jagex Games Studio, a leading online games publisher. Stellar Dawn is a combat-driven MMORPG with a rich sci-fi storyline.

Its an MMORPG…

item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Such as? Back when I played RS there weren’t any minigames I don’t think, so I don’t know.

RuneScape

RuneScape - Free Fantasy MMORPG Browser Game

A free browser based MMORPG game updated with fresh content each month. Set in a medieval fantasy realm; experience story-driven quests, master skills and make new friends.

item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“asyo4, post:26, topic:348972”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=445343.msg3280610#msg3280610 date=1279843594]

Why does JaGeX work on other MMO’s, if they didnt I couldve bet you that RS wouldve been 5x of what it is today.

???

I’d like to hear your reasoning.
[/quote]
because they would be focusing on one MMO instead of war of legends and stellar dawn[/quote]
In the way I see it this is good for RS, more profit give Jagex room for expanding both SD and RS. If it is true that they use the same engine, improvement in SD helps RS.

Stellar Dawn is the forthcoming sci-fi MMORPG from Jagex, the creators of the highly acclaimed RuneScape. Set in an alien star system, Stellar Dawn will offer an exciting multiplayer game experience in your browser. Coming 2011.

Doesn’t mean beta is in 2011 but it also doesn’t mean it wont be 2011.
